alert.note: Alert for Leon; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 6:40PM CST until January 25 at 9:36PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Navasota River Near Easterly affecting Leon and Robertson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navasota River near Easterly. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur from below Easterly to below Highway 21. Cattle in the flood plain could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 6.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday morning to a crest of 20.0 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
